member.name: T:HTMLDocumentation.Documentation
member.summary: Stores a string which describes the object this attribute is attached to

member.name: P:HTMLDocumentation.Documentation.DocString
member.summary: The string containing the description for our documentation.

member.name: M:HTMLDocumentation.HTMLWriter.ShouldWriteMethod(System.Reflection.MethodInfo)
member.summary: Utility function for determining whether a method should be written to this type's HTML page. Returns true if the method was declared inside the type we are writing and is not a getter or setter for a property.

member.name: M:HTMLDocumentation.HTMLWriter.WriteMethods(System.Reflection.BindingFlags)
member.summary: Iterates over all the methods of the current type and attempts to right any methods which satisfy the input flags and also the ShouldWriteMethod.

member.name: M:HTMLDocumentation.HTMLWriter.WriteMethod(System.Reflection.MethodInfo)
member.summary: Writes all the information about a method, including: Parameters Return type Template arguments Whether it is virtual

member.name: M:HTMLDocumentation.HTMLWriter.GetXMLDocNodeForMethod(System.Reflection.MethodInfo)
member.summary: Uses the input method to find the appropriate node in the documentation XML file and returns the XPathNavigator at that position.

member.name: M:HTMLDocumentation.HTMLWriter.WriteLine(System.String)
member.summary: Overwrite the writeline function with our own implementation that uses the indentation
